dbConnection

Class DBconnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbConnection.DBconnection

  • public class DBconnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class Set up the Database table structure and create a DB connection pool.
    Author:
    Yaniv Peretz.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DBconnection()
      Constructor Setup JDBC driver (Java DataBase Client) and initialize the connection pool.
